iconOnly.description: There are only icons, and the buttons are equal in width and height. If icon is specified and there are no children, iconOnly defaults to true
iconOnly.description_zh: 只有图标，按钮宽高相等。如果指定 icon 且没有 children，iconOnly 默认为 true

loadingFixedWidth.description: When loading, the width of the button is not changed.
loadingFixedWidth.description_zh: 当 loading 的时候，不改变按钮的宽度。

long.description: The width of the button adapts to the container.
long.description_zh: 按钮宽度随容器自适应。

href.description: Add a jump link, set this property, and the button behaves the same as the A tag
href.description_zh: 添加跳转链接，设置此属性，button表现跟a标签一致

target.description: a linked target attribute, which takes effect when href exists
target.description_zh: a 链接的 target 属性，href 存在时生效

htmlType.description: The button's native HTML Type type
htmlType.description_zh: 按钮原生的 html type 类型

shape.description: Button shapes, circle - round, round - fully rounded, square - rectangular
shape.description_zh: 按钮形状，circle - 圆形， round - 全圆角， square - 长方形

type.type: default / primary / secondary / dashed / text / outline
type.description: There are six main types of buttons: primary buttons, secondary buttons, dotted box buttons, text buttons, linear buttons, and default is a secondary button.
type.description_zh: 按钮主要分为六种按钮类型：主要按钮、次级按钮、虚框按钮、文字按钮、线性按钮，default 为次级按钮。

:anchorProps.description: a The native attribute of the link, which takes effect when the href exists
:anchorProps.description_zh: a 链接的原生属性，href 存在时生效

events.name: onClick
events.description: Click the callback of the button
